class Z001_CL_GOS_RECORD_HR definition

  create public .

    redefinition .
protected section.

*" methods
methods:
  CHECK_STATUS
    redefinition .
private section.
*"* private components of class Z001_CL_GOS_RECORD_HR
*"* do not include other source files here!!!

  data RECORD type ref to Z001_CL_RECORD .
ENDCLASS.



CLASS Z001_CL_GOS_RECORD_HR IMPLEMENTATION.


METHOD CHECK_STATUS .
* ...
  DATA lp_return TYPE saeprior.
  data: cs_objtype TYPE toaom-sap_object,
        pernr type string.
**
  ep_status = mp_status_inactive.
  if gs_lporb-catid = 'BC'.
    ep_status = mp_status_inactive.
  else.
    cs_objtype = gs_lporb-typeid.
    if cs_objtype = 'PREL' or cs_objtype = 'BUS1065'.
      pernr = gs_lporb-instid.
      record = Z001_cl_record=>record_exists( pernr ).
      if not record is initial.
        ep_status = mp_status_active.
      endif.
    endif.
  endif.

ENDMETHOD.


METHOD EXECUTE .
  record->display( ).
ENDMETHOD.
ENDCLASS.
name: Z001_CL_GOS_RECORD_HR
